select
from texture where seller_id = #{sellerId} and title = #{title}
select count(id) from texture where class_id=#{classid} and seller_id=#{sellerid} and group_id=#{groupid}
mapper.insert: insert into texture (id, title, class_id, seller_id, status, create_time, update_time, group_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
